channel.title: aba biosynthesis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in aba biosynthesis on funPlantGenes

item.title: AaORA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaORA Gene Name: octadecanoid-derivative responsive AP2-domain Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: AaTCP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaTCP15 Gene Name: aldehyde dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: ABF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g23480 Gene Symbol: ABF2 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A model was proposed to illustrate how ABF2 mediates the ABA signalling involved in sucrose transport, chlorophyll degradation, auxin homoeostasis, carotenoid and ABA biosynthesis, and cell wall metabolism during citrus fruit development.

item.title: AchnFAR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Achn107181 Gene Symbol: AchnFAR Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: MYB41, MYB107, and MYC2 promote ABA-mediated primary fatty alcohol accumulation via activation of AchnFAR in wound suberization in kiwifruit.

item.title: ALDH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ALDH1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: BnaA07.ZEP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnaA07.ZEP Gene Name: Zeaxanthin epoxidase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The functional divergence of the gene pairs BnaA09.

item.title: BnaC07.ZEP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnaC07.ZEP Gene Name: Zeaxanthin epoxidase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The functional divergence of the gene pairs BnaA09.

item.title: BnGLK1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07g00410D Gene Symbol: BnGLK1a Gene Name: Golden2-like 1a Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: A Golden2-like transcription factor, BnGLK1a, improves chloroplast development, photosynthesis, and seed weight in rapeseed.

item.title: BnPHT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnPHT1|4 Gene Name: PHT1 phosphate transporter Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The high-affinity transporter BnPHT1|4|BnPHT1|4 is involved in phosphorus acquisition and mobilization for facilitating seed germination and early seedling growth of Brassica napus.

item.title: ClSnRK2.3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G038540 Gene Symbol: ClSnRK2.3 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClSnRK2.

item.title: CrBCH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrBCH2 Gene Name: β-carotene hydroxylases 2 Genome: Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: An R2R3-MYB transcription factor represses the transformation of α- and β-branch carotenoids by negatively regulating expression of CrBCH2 and CrNCED5 in flavedo of Citrus reticulate.

item.title: CrNCED5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrNCED5 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase 5 Genome: Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: An R2R3-MYB transcription factor represses the transformation of α- and β-branch carotenoids by negatively regulating expression of CrBCH2 and CrNCED5 in flavedo of Citrus reticulate.

item.title: CsBPC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsBPC2 Gene Name: BASIC PENTACYSTEINE 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsBPC2 knockout reduced cucumber cold tolerance by increasing the chilling injury index, relative electrical conductivity and malondialdehyde (MDA) content and decreasing antioxidant enzyme activity.

item.title: CsbZIP44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g25230 Gene Symbol: CsbZIP44 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP44 is essential for ABA-mediated carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsHB5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g17870 Gene Symbol: CsHB5 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsHB5, a positive regulator of ABA and carotenoid-driven processes, activates the expression of CsbZIP44 by binding to its promoter.

item.title: CsWAX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa020530 Gene Symbol: CsWAX2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber Genome Database (http://cucumber.

item.title: Csyf2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_4G007140 Gene Symbol: Csyf2 Gene Name: C.

item.title: D3
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g06050 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0154200 Gene Symbol: D3 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: DcWRKY33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Dca30498 Gene Symbol: DcWRKY33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Dianthus caryophyllus Functional Descriptions: DcWRKY33 promotes petal senescence in carnation (Dianthus caryophyllus L.

item.title: DkbZIP5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkbZIP5 Gene Name: putative basic leucine-zipper transcription factor5 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: Seasonal Abscisic Acid Signal and a Basic Leucine Zipper Transcription Factor, DkbZIP5, Regulate Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Persimmon Fruit.

item.title: FaGAMYB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGAMYB Gene Name: MYB transcription factor Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Central role of FaGAMYB in the transition of the strawberry receptacle from development to ripening.

item.title: FaMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor10 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: This insertion introduced a predicted premature termination codon, which suggested the loss of intact FaMYB10 protein playing a critical role in the loss of red colour in white octoploid strawberry.

item.title: FaRIPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaRIPK1 Gene Name: red-initial protein kinase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Silencing FaRIPK1 expression by VIGS affects ripening-related processes and corresponding gene expression.

item.title: FcWRKY40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FcWRKY40 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 40 Genome: Species: Citrus japonic Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor FcWRKY40 of Fortunella crassifolia functions positively in salt tolerance through modulation of ion homeostasis and proline biosynthesis by directly regulating SOS2 and P5CS1 homologs.

item.title: GhGLU19A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A04G0109 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19A Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhGLU19D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G3612 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19D Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhNAC83
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GlaUn057212 Gene Symbol: GhNAC83 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhNAC83 inhibits corm dormancy release by regulating ABA signaling and cytokinin biosynthesis in Gladiolus hybridus.

item.title: LeNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxy-carotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid levels in tomato ovaries are regulated by LeNCED1 and SlCYP707A1.

item.title: MdMYBS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD00G1169600 Gene Symbol: MdMYBS1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid activates transcription factor module MdABI5–MdMYBS1 during carotenoid-derived apple fruit coloration.

item.title: MdSE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSE Gene Name: SERRATE Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdSE acts as a negative regulator of apple (Malus × domestica) drought resistance by regulating the expression levels of MdMYB88 and MdMYB124 and miRNAs, including mdm-miR156, mdm-miR166, mdm-miR172, mdm-miR319, and mdm-miR399.

item.title: MdSHINE2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000178263 Gene Symbol: MdSHINE2 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple AP2/EREBP transcription factor MdSHINE2 confers drought resistance by regulating wax biosynthesis.

item.title: MeABA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.10G150700 Gene Symbol: MeABA1 Gene Name: ABA DEFICIENT 1 Genome: high-quality genome sequence Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The intron retention transcript of MeABA1 (ABA DEFICIENT 1) was highly correlated with PPD symptoms in cassava storage roots.

item.title: MeSCL33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.09G040200 Gene Symbol: MeSCL33 Gene Name: SC35-like splicing factor 33 Genome: high-quality genome sequence Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: RNA yeast 3-hybrid and RNA immunoprecipitation (RIP) assays showed that the serine/arginine-rich protein MeSCL33 (SC35-like splicing factor 33) binds to the precursor mRNA of MeABA1.

item.title: miR2105
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: None RAPdb gene ID: None Gene Symbol: miR2105 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: NaWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaWRKY70 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: NaWRKY70 is a key regulator of Nicotiana attenuata resistance to Alternaria alternata through regulation of phytohormones and phytoalexins biosynthesis.

item.title: PacCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.title: PavBBX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PavBBX6 Gene Name: Genome: sweet cherry genome version 1.

item.title: PavBBX9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PavBBX9 Gene Name: Genome: sweet cherry genome version 1.

item.title: PavDof15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PavDof15 Gene Name: DNA-binding with One Finger 15 Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid-responsive transcription factors PavDof2/PavDof6/PavDof15 mediate fruit softening in sweet cherry.

item.title: PavDof2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PavDof2 Gene Name: DNA-binding with One Finger 2 Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid-responsive transcription factors PavDof2/PavDof6/PavDof15 mediate fruit softening in sweet cherry.

item.title: PavDof6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PavDof6 Gene Name: DNA-binding with One Finger 6 Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid-responsive transcription factors PavDof2/PavDof6/PavDof15 mediate fruit softening in sweet cherry.

item.title: PHS-3D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS3D02G468400 Gene Symbol: PHS-3D Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: PpERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.7G194400 Gene Symbol: PpERF3 Gene Name: ethylene response transcription factor 3 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpERF3 positively regulates ABA biosynthesis by activating PpNCED2/3 transcription during fruit ripening in peach.

item.title: SAPK10;OsSAPK10
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g41460 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0610900 Gene Symbol: SAPK10 OsSAPK10 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: SlAN11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAN11 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA GLABRA 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlAN11 regulates flavonoid biosynthesis and seed dormancy by interaction with bHLH proteins but not with MYB proteins.

item.title: SlCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCYP707A1 Gene Name: Abscisic acid 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid levels in tomato ovaries are regulated by LeNCED1 and SlCYP707A1.

item.title: SlDREB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlDREB Gene Name: dehydration-responsive element-binding protein Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of SlDREB downregulates GA biosynthesis genes.

item.title: SlMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g005570 Gene Symbol: SlMYB15 Gene Name: SlMYB15 transcription factor Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlMYB15 transcription factor targeted by sly-miR156e-3p positively regulates ABA-mediated cold tolerance.

item.title: SlNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlNCED1 and SlCYP707A2: key genes involved in ABA metabolism during tomato fruit ripening.

item.title: SlUGT75C1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g092500 Gene Symbol: SlUGT75C1 Gene Name: UDP-glycosyltransferase 75C1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlUGT75C1 catalyzes the glucosylation of both ABA and IAA in vitro| SlUGT76E1 can only catalyze the conjugation of ABA| and SlUGT73C4 cannot glycosylate either ABA or IAA.

item.title: TaMs1-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaMs1-B Gene Name: MALE STERILITY 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat TaMs1 is a glycosylphosphatidylinositol-anchored lipid transfer protein necessary for pollen development.

item.title: VvNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_19s0093g00550 Gene Symbol: VvNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase 1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: At this point in the culture, our results suggest that of those genes involved in ABA accumulation, one (VvNCED1) was repressed, while another (VvBG2) was activated.
